resources.string:
"Today its been 280 days since we met on 27th march, 2021. This 280 days I'll never forget in my life as you changed my life by making me less introvert. Before you I have never talked to any girl (except sisters ðŸ˜‚). Your entry in my life as friend was truly unexpected. I have never met anyone with so pure heart. Dil ni bou saaf but little heart broken due to xyz events.

" "You are the first one with whom I had shared my secrets / feelings. Thank you for being trustworthy person. I don't trust people easily but don't know why my instinct said that you are trustworthy and my instinct was correct about you.

" "I don't have any siblings but still I don't feel it when I am with you.
" "Thank you for trusting me and letting me capable enough to be a listener of your secrets.

" "I don't have words for thanking you for being as friend in my life.

" "I will make sure that you would never find any complaints of me.

" "The biggest thanks for not breaking friendship with me after that 'crush' situation ðŸ˜…

" "I really don't want to loose you as friend ever in my life ðŸ¥º

" "Hope you liked my little gift on your birthday
" "From your friend, Somil"
